annotations.description: I thought it might be nice to release this historic drink, one of the most quintessential in the cannon created in the Fair city of New Orleans. The Brandy C...
annotations.title: Master The Classics: Brandy Crusta

textContent:
1.5oz or 45ml Cognac
.5oz or 15ml Cointreau
.5oz or 15ml Maraschino Liqueur
.75oz or 20ml Lemon Juice
2 Dashes Angostura Bitters
Sugar Rim
Lemon Peel Garnish

Shake and pour into coupe

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fhn5vqWcx-E
title: Brandy Crusta
